title: Ep. 25 - We flew 5,000 miles to interview Ludwig's mom
description: It's pod time everyone, hopefully this episode can give you a break from pretending to care about your relatives' lives. We flew all the way out to Ludwig's childhood home to do an episode in his freezing backyard, with his mom tagging in for a bit to answer some burning questions we've had for years. Other topics discussed: Aimen's former classmate who fucked a horse, Ludwig's polaroid mishap, and Nick eats a cookie.

itunes:author: The Yard
